Description: The Flight into Egypt; the Virgin and Christ Child on a donkey led by Joseph, a tree and cliff behind, a fortified building in the distance to right Pen and brown ink, with brown wash, over charcoal or black chalk
Producer name: Formerly attributed to: Pier Francesco Mola
Curator's comments: Lit.: N. Turner, 'Italian Drawings in the BM, Roman Baroque Drawings', London, 1999, I, no. 380 Turner 1999 The drawing was formerly placed with the unmounted drawings of Pier Francesco Mola (q.v.). The treatment of the figures appears, however, to reflect the work of Guglielmo Cortese and it seemed more useful to place the drawing under his name.
Bibliographic references: Turner 1999 / Roman Baroque Drawings c.1620 to c.1700 (380)
